scene.name: NorthernCrater

h4.a: The Shinra Arrive at the Crater

scene.p: Flying off a cliff at the end of the snowboarding slopes, Cloud and the others land in Great Glacier.

Cloud
Ugh...
He gets to his feet.

I guess we're still in one piece.
Everyone all right?
The others get up.

blockquote.p:
Barret
Of course.

Tifa
Yeah, somehow.

Nanaki
Got snow in my ear...

Yuffie
God! I can't stand it!

Cait Sith
A little off.

Vincent
Yeah, I'm all right.

Cid
I can't be doin' this! Damn!

scene.p:
Cloud
So where did we land?
Seems like it didn't end up being such a big jump... / We've jumped pretty far...

blockquote.p:
Barret
Hey, what's that!? They just gave you something, right? Let's use the [] button to find out.

Tifa
Oh yeah, we got the map, right? Let's look at the map by pressing the [] button.

Yuffie
At times like these, we need the map! Let's open it with the [] button.

Cait Sith
Then, let's look at the map. Just open it with the [] button.

Vincent
We should check it on the map. Press the [] button.

Cid
Quick! The map, the map! Look at it with the [] button!

scene.p:
Cloud
It sure is cold. We'll freeze if we stay here any longer.
In the Frostbite Cave...

Cloud
Looks like trouble.
- We're outta here!
- Wait a minute!
Choosing "We're outta here," Cloud does some fancy footwork and ends up outside of Great Glacier entirely.
There is a cave within the mountains where they find a woman in blue. If Cloud speaks to her without going to the hot springs...

Woman in Blue
...Please leave.
Please don't worry about me.
Now, I don't want to harm any of you.
And don't come back again.
Please stop it.
Please, that is enough.
At the hot springs...

Cloud
This is the only place not frozen.
- Touch it
- Let's go on

Cloud
Hmm, a hot spring.
Having gone to the hot springs, Cloud and the others may return to the woman in the mountain cave.

Woman in Blue
Yeeew... You got a lot of nerve trying to touch me with the same dirty hands that touched that filthy hot spring!
I'll never forgive you.
Cloud and the others fight and defeat the Snow woman.

Woman in Blue
Why this...?
The woman collapses.
Received "Alexander" Materia!
Travelling into the northern reaches of the glacier, they end up on seemingly endless snowfields.

Cloud
...Snow... as far as you can see... Better watch where I walk.
...I'll place a landmark, and start walking.

p.span: If Cloud makes it to Holzoff's house on his own...

scene.p:
Holzoff
Now, this is a surprise!!
How many years has it been since I last saw anyone here...?
Oh, excuse me! My name is Holzoff. I've lived here for 20 years now.
You mind listening to the stories of a lonely climber?
Why don't we go to the next room and sit down.

p.span: If Cloud collapses before reaching the house...

scene.p: Cloud wakes to find himself in Holzoff's house.

Holzoff
You awake?
You collapsed at the Great Glacier. It's a miracle you're all right.
Cloud scratches his head.

Holzoff
My name is Holzoff. I've been living here 20 years now.
If you are planning to head North, you'd better listen to my story.
Why don't we go to the next room and sit down.
They go into the next room and sit down.

Holzoff
You ever hear about those who challenged the cliff?

Cloud
- Yeah
- No

Holzoff
The first time my friend Yamski and I tried to climb the cliff was 30 years ago.

Holzoff
There's an old legend that says something fell from the sky here a long time ago.
That's what's supposed to have pushed the land up and formed this cliff.
30 Years ago, Yamski and I took this cliff on to see what was on the other side.

Holzoff
But, we weren't prepared for it. We did expect the temperature to be low but...
On that cliff, there's always a biting cold wind. The cold air lowers your body temperature.
Yamski, was below me. He cut his own rope...
...and I didn't even notice...
Ever since then, I've settled here... continuing to challenge the cliff, and provide warning and shelter to my fellow climbers.
If you're going to climb the cliff, there's 2 precautions you'll need to take.
First, check your route... It's hard to find because of all the snow.
Second, once you get to a ledge, make sure you warm yourselves up.
Understand?

Cloud
- One more time
- Yes

Holzoff
You must've used a lot of energy getting up here... Better get some rest before you head out.
Cloud and the others spend the night and then gather outside.

Barret
You know, I've been thinkin'...?

Cloud
- What is it?
- Save it for later

Barret
...Seein' a place like this, makes you realize how awesome nature is.
But, if anyone ever told me to live here, I'd tell them to... you know...
I'll tell you one thing though, If I did have to live here I'd change things around 'n' make it better.
I guess the total opposite of this would be...... Midgar.
When you think of it that way, Shinra don't seem so bad...
Uuuuuuurrrrrgh!!
What the hell am I sayin'!? The Shinra, not bad!?

Cloud
We'll secure the route. You come up later.

Barret
Y'know... standing here like this...
Kinda makes you feel like the Planet's not on our side, don't it?
Of course we can't even compete. I mean... The Planet don't even notice us humans...

Tifa
This blizzard's nothing! I gotta say that or... brr...

Nanaki
I wonder what's at the top of that cliff? Well we shall see...

Yuffie
Brrrr, I can't take this cold!!

Cait Sith
This is secret info, but... Rufus's going to arrive here, too.

Vincent
I wonder what's on the other side of the cliff...

Cid
Damn! If I could just get back in the air, this cliff would be nothing!
Cloud and the others scale Gaea's Cliffs. In a tunnel near the top of the cliffs, they come across one of the clones.

Clone
Ugh...... Errgaahh!!

It collapses and disappears. Cloud runs through the tunnel and runs into a two-headed dragon. After defeating it, Cloud and the others continue through the tunnel and reach the top of Gaea's Cliffs. They look over the edge at the crater and then start down the slope.

Cloud
An old crater...
Something fell out of the sky and crashed down here......
Leaving a scar on the planet.

blockquote.p:
Barret
So all this energy's gathered here for the planet to heal itself?

Tifa
So the planet has gathered all this energy here to heal itself?

Nanaki
The energy of the planet is concentrated here.
It is slowly healing its old wound.

Yuffie
Even I know what's going on. The energy's bein' gathered here to heal the gash.

Cait Sith
It's trying to heal its wound by gathering all that energy here.

Vincent
It's amassed a vast amount of energy to heal itself.

Cid
Damn, this's somethin'. It's gathered all that energy to try an' heal itself.

scene.p:
Cloud
Sephiroth took that energy and is trying to use Meteor.
Next time the wound won't be so small.
They continue down the slope.

Clone
...b, back... to... Sep...... i... roth...
Further down, they come to the edge of Whirlwind Maze.

p.span: If Tifa is in the party...

scene.p:
Tifa
The time has come to settle things with Sephiroth, huh?
Cloud nods.

Tifa
I, too, have lost many things because of Sephiroth.
Let's go!

p.span: If Tifa is not in the party...

scene.p:
Tifa
Cloud, wait for me!!
Please take me with you. You're going to have it out with Sephiroth, aren't you?
Because of Sephiroth, I, too, have lost many things, so please take me along.
Don't say no. Okay?......

Cloud
It can't be helped......
One of the others stays behind:

blockquote.p:
Barret
The rest is up to you!

Nanaki
I'm going to call everyone.

Yuffie
Are you saying you don't like me?

Cait Sith
I'll gather everybody, so you go on ahead.

Vincent
Don't be caught off guard...... Sephiroth may be near.

Cid
Man, I sure am thankful. Wanna rest a while?

scene.p: They move on through the maze. Reaching the first wind wall, Cloud looks up.

Cloud
That's......!!!
Above them flies the Highwind, with a full compliment of Shinra executives.

Rufus
So, I finally found you.

Scarlet
Kyaa haa hah.
Kyaa haa hah.
haa hah
haa......... hah
This is incredible......

Heidegger
This is the Promised Land the President has been searching for!!

Rufus
But, I'll be the one who gets it.
Sorry, old man.

Hojo
Heh heh heh......
That land is no one's.
It's where the Reunion will take place...... They will all gather here......
I wonder if we'll see...... Sephiroth?
Back to Cloud and the first wind wall.

Tifa
We need to cross when the wind is calm, or we'll get swept off!

Clones
uph... Se... phi... roth...
wh-... who---a
Beyond the first wind wall, a long trail of Sephiroth clones works its way towards the second wind wall. Beyond the second wall, Cloud comes upon Sephiroth attacking the clones.

Sephiroth
This is the end... for all of you.

Cloud
Sephiroth!!!
This is the end!

Sephiroth
You're right. This is the end of this body's usefulness.
He disappears and the screen tints red.

Cloud
He disappeared!?

Tifa
He might still be nearby......
Our purpose is to deliver the Black materia to our master.

Cloud
Our...?

blockquote.p:
Barret
He got away?

Nanaki
I feel something... danger?

Yuffie
I was just getting into it!

Cait Sith
Vanished?...That can't be!

Vincent
Stay on alert. You never know when Sephiroth might appear.

Cid
Hey, hey,! What's goin' on?

scene.p: Those who carry Jenova's cells...

Cloud
Master...!?

Of course... Sephiroth.
Heh, heh, heh...
Sephiroth leaps down and knocks them all to the ground. Cloud slowly gets to his feet, and they enter a battle with Jenova∙DEATH. Afterwards, the Black Materia is left lying on the ground.

Cloud
Jenova's cells...
...hmm. So that's what this is all about.
The Jenova Reunion...

Tifa
Not Sephiroth!? You mean all this time it wasn't Sephiroth we've been after?

Cloud
I'll explain later. Right now, the only thing I'm thinking about is beating Sephiroth.

Tifa
But Sephiroth is......

Cloud
He's here. The real Sephiroth is just beyond here.
It's both incredibly wicked and cruel...
But it's releasing a powerfully strong will from deep within this planet's wound.
He walks forward to pick up the Black Materia.

...The Black Materia is back in our hands.
Now all we have to do is defeat Sephiroth and that'll be the end of it.

Tifa
We'd better not take the Black Materia any further. Why don't you give it to someone else to hold on to?

blockquote.p:
Nanaki
What's happening, Cloud? That wasn't Sephiroth!

Yuffie
What!? You mean that wasn't Sephiroth? All that time I was following this... thing?

Cait Sith
You serious!? That's not Sephiroth!

Vincent
You mean... we weren't in pursuit of Sephiroth...?

Cid
Hoo-boy...

scene.p:
Yuffie
I don't want anything to do with that Black Materia!

Cait Sith
No, not the Black materia, please.

Vincent
How about if you hold on to the Black Materia?

Cloud
I don't think I can...

Cid
Me and Black Materia just don't mix.

p.span: Cloud gives the Black Materia to Barret.

scene.p:
Barret
Damn, man! ...Pressure's on now.

p.span: Cloud gives the Black Materia to Nanaki.

scene.p:
Nanaki
You want me to take the Black Materia? ......all right, I understand.

Cloud
Don't give it to ANYONE. I'm counting on you.

Barret
Sephiroth...... What a damn crazy #*&^%.

Nanaki
Cloud, be careful!

Yuffie
Shouldn't we hurry? The real Sephiroth is still close, right?

Cait Sith
Something feels rea---lly weird here!

Vincent
You never know when Sephiroth may show up... so don't let your guard down.

Cid
Let me catch some shut-eye.

Tifa
Let's find Sephiroth!!

Cloud
We're going in first! You guys stay and keep watch.

blockquote.p:
Barret
I'll take care of the Black Materia. No matter what happens, I'll be right here.

Nanaki
I'll protect the Black Materia no matter what!

scene.p: Cloud moves on past the final wind wall and suddenly everything goes white.

Tifa
What is this? What happened?

Cloud
Calm down, Tifa.
Sephiroth is near. Anything could happen.
The surroundings change to Nibelheim. Cloud and the others stand at its gates.

Tifa
Nibelheim...

blockquote.p:
Barret
Why Nibelheim!? Are you high on Mako or something?

Nanaki
But, why!? A dream? An illusion?

Yuffie
But why Nibelheim? This is freaky, REALLY freaky!

Cait Sith
But Tifa! Isn't this an illusion?

Vincent
...Why...... is it an illusion?

Cid
What the hell? Why Nibelheim!?

scene.p:
Cloud
This is an illusion Sephiroth made up.
He's trying to confuse us.
It'll be all right. As long as we know it's an illusion, there's nothing to be afraid of.
Come on, let's keep going.

Tifa
Yeah, you're right...
Look!!
They turn around and run aside as Sephiroth walks up to the gates. He turns to someone behind him.

Sephiroth
All right, let's go.
Two soldiers and a man with spiky black hair follow Sephiroth into Nibelheim.

blockquote.p:
Barret
That ain't Cloud... The hell is he?

Nanaki
Cloud's not here... I wonder who...... this is...?

Yuffie
Huh---! Cloud's not here.

Cait Sith
Cloud, something's strange here. Who is this guy?

Vincent
...It's not Cloud. Who is this man?

Cid
Cloud's not here......

scene.p: Tifa shakes her head, and the others turn to look at her.

Tifa
Stop... Sephiroth.

Cloud
This is so stupid...
A flash, and Sephiroth and the others vanish.

blockquote.p:
Barret
How the hell're we gonna get outta here?

Nanaki
Is this illusion going to continue forever? How do we get out of it?

Yuffie
I don't want to be in an illusion. Let's get back to the real world!

Cait Sith
Come on, we have to hurry back to the real world!

Vincent
Now, how can we get out of here...?

Cid
Hey, Cloud. Let's get back to the real world, huh.

scene.p:
Tifa
Cloud... It's just an illusion.
Don't worry about it...
Another flash of white.

Cloud
What's... next?

Tifa
Stop it already!!
A burning Nibelheim fades into view.

blockquote.p:
Barret
This is bad... Just like Corel.

Nanaki
This is terrible... Did Sephiroth do this?

Yuffie
Wow...... I didn't know it was THIS bad...

Cait Sith
This is insane...

Vincent
...All this... while I was sleeping...

Cid
This is terrible...

scene.p:
Cloud
...This is what actually happened five years ago.
But...
It's probably not me that's going to come out of the Shinra mansion.
He's going to try and show us another stupid illusion.
The black-haired SOLDIER runs out of the mansion.

Cloud
See... didn't I tell you?
The SOLDIER shakes his head and walks closer to the burning buildings.

Zangan
Hey it's you! You're still sane, right?
The SOLDIER nods.

Zangan
Then come over here and help me!
The SOLDIER runs over to help Zangan.

Tifa
I don't want to... watch this. Cloud... don't watch.

Zangan
I'll check this house. You check that one over there!
He runs into one of the houses.

Cloud
...What's wrong, Tifa? I told you before, right?
As long as we know that it's just an illusion, there's no need to be scared.
The screen goes white and Cloud and the others find themselves in the midst of the burning town square. Nearby, the man with the camera lies motionless.

blockquote.p:
Barret
Hey, you awright!?
Damn! This was an illusion.

Nanaki
You all right!!
We were in an illusion...

Yuffie
He... hey, you! You alright!?
Oh, a dream! But it felt so real...

Cait Sith
Everyone Ok?
Umm...this was a hallucination.

Vincent
...You all right?
Hmm... it was an illusion.

Cid
He...hey you!
You alright!?

scene.p:
Cloud
Sephiroth! I know you're listening! I know what you want to say!
That I wasn't in Nibelheim five years ago.
That's it, isn't it?
A flash, and Sephiroth appears before them.

Sephiroth
I see you finally understand.

Cloud
What you are trying to say is that you want to confuse me, right?
But... even making me see those things won't affect me.
I remember it all. The heat of the fire... the pain in my body... and in my heart!

Sephiroth
Oh, is that so?
You are just a puppet... You have no heart... and cannot feel any pain...
How can there be any meaning in the memory of such a being?
What I have shown you is reality. What you remember, that is the illusion.

Everyone
Cloud...

Sephiroth
...Do you understand?

Cloud
I don't want to understand.
But, I want to ask you one thing. Why... why are you doing this?

Sephiroth
Ha, ha, ha......
I want to take you back to your real self.
The one who gave me the Black Materia that day...
Who would have ever thought a failed experiment would prove so useful?
Hojo would die if he knew.

Cloud
Hojo!? What does he have to do with me!?

Sephiroth
Five years ago you were...
...constructed by Hojo, piece by piece, right after Nibelheim was burnt.
A puppet made up of vibrant Jenova cells, her knowledge, and the power of Mako.
An incomplete Sephiroth-clone. Not even given a number. ...That is your reality.
Ha, ha, ha......

Tifa
Cloud... Don't listen to him...
Close your ears! Close your eyes!

Cloud
What's wrong, Tifa? I'm not affected by it.
...I wasn't paying attention to him.

Tifa
All that talk of Hojo constructing you is a lie.
Don't we have our memories together?
Being kids together, starlit nights...

Sephiroth
Ha, ha, ha... Tifa...
Why are you so worried and scared by those words?
Hmm... Shall I show everyone here what's in your heart?
Tifa turns away from both him and Cloud.

Sephiroth
Ha, ha, ha... You look like you're not feeling well.

Cloud
...Tifa? Is Sephiroth right?

Tifa
Cloud...

Cloud
Why are you so scared? Don't worry about me. I'm all right.
No matter how confused I am, I'll never believe a word that Sephiroth says.
It's true that sometimes I can't figure out who I am.
There's a lot of things muddled up in my memories.
But, Tifa......
But you said, 'Long time no see, Cloud' right?
Those words will always support me.
I am the one you grew up with. I'm Cloud of Nibelheim.
No matter how much I lose faith in myself, that is the truth.
That's why you shouldn't be so scared.
No matter what anyone else says to me, it's your attitude that counts...

Tifa
No, that's not true, Cloud......

Cloud
What's not? Aren't I the same Cloud you grew up with?

Tifa
That's not what I mean... I don't know how to say it...
Cloud, I need some time... Just give me a little time...
A flash and Sephiroth appears beyond the fire.

Sephiroth
Cloud... Don't blame Tifa.
The ability to change one's looks, voice, and words, is the power of Jenova.
Inside of you, Jenova has merged with Tifa's memories, creating you.
Out of Tifa's memory......
A boy named Cloud might've just been a part of them.
He disappears in another flash.

Tifa
Cloud...
Please... don't think right now.
Sephiroth reappears closer to them.

Sephiroth
Ha, ha, ha...... Think, Cloud!
...Cloud? Ha, ha, ha...... Oh, excuse me. You never had a name...

Cloud
Shut up... Sephiroth.

Sephiroth
You still don't understand? Then...
He turns away and laughs.

Do you remember the picture that we took before we headed for Mt. Nibel?
...Tifa, you remember, right?
But there is no way he would know.
Now... what happened to that picture?
He walks over to the motionless camera man.

......is this it?
...Do you want to see it? It turned out pretty good.

Tifa
Cloud... don't...

Cloud
I... should be in the picture.
Even if I'm not in there, no worry. This is just an illusory world Sephiroth made up.
Cloud walks over to look at the photo. The black-haired SOLDIER is standing where Cloud should have been.

Cloud
...Just as I thought.
This picture's a fake. The truth is in my memory.
...Five years ago, I came back to Nibelheim, to inspect the reactor. I was sixteen.
The town hadn't changed at all. What did I do...? Oh yeah...
I saw my mom. I saw the people in town.
Yeah, I went to Tifa's room. There, I...
I played the piano!
I looked in the drawers!
I read the letter addressed to Tifa!
I spent the night and went to the reactor in Mt. Nibel. I was excited about it.
Because that was my first mission after becoming First Class in SOLDIER.
Flash.

Cloud
...SOLDIER, First Class?
He shakes his head.
...SOLDIER? When did I enter SOLDIER?
He clutches his head.
How did I join SOLDIER?
He falls to his knees.

Why... why can't I remember?
I'm... I'm...
He gets back to his feet.

That's right...
...I didn't have to worry about it, because I was...
The screen fades to black.

Tifa
......Cloud?

Cloud
Let's go, Tifa. I'm... I'm all right.
Meanwhile, the Shinra have arrived at the center of the crater.

Scarlet
Wow!! That's amazing!
It's all Materia!!

Rufus
The outside is rich with mako energy. The inside is a treasure trove of Materia. This truly is the Promised Land.

Hojo
There is no such thing as the Promised Land. it's a legend... an old wives tale...... it's utterly ridiculous.

Rufus
Everything's as I imagined it to be. Isn't it splendid?
It is that kind of dullness that makes you a second-rate scientist.
The ground starts quaking.

Rufus
What's happening?

Scarlet
It's coming from within the wall! Something's in there! It's moving!
A huge eye in the wall opens and closes.

Hojo
Weapon...
Then it really does exist... I didn't believe in it.

Rufus
What does this mean?

Hojo
...Weapon. Monsters created by the Planet.
It appears when the Planet is in danger, reducing everything to nothingness.
That's what was stated in Professor Gast's report.

Rufus
I never saw that report... Where is it?
Hojo taps his head.

Hojo
Here, right here.

Rufus
You keep a lot of things to yourself.
Back with who Cloud left guarding the Black Materia...

blockquote.p:
Barret
Are Cloud and the others awright?
But what's up with that? One little piece of materia, destroying the planet...

Nanaki
I wonder how Cloud and the others are...
It's hard to believe... such a small piece of materia is able to destroy the Planet...

scene.p: Suddenly the others disappear and the background becomes a roiling green.

blockquote.p:
Barret
What the......?
The hell was that?
H, huh!?
Hey... Guys!
Where are we? Where did we end up?

Nanaki
What the!?
Is everyone all right?
What's going on?
Where am I!? Don't leave me alone!

scene.p: Tifa comes running up.

Tifa
Barret, you're here! I'm so glad!!
Or:
Nanaki, you're here! I'm so glad!!
The background returns, but still no one else is there.

blockquote.p:
Barret
Tifa!!
Something's weird here! It got pitch black all of a sudden, and everyone disappeared!

Nanaki
Tifa!!
Something is strange... Why was it dark all of a sudden and where is everybody?

scene.p:
Tifa
Everyone's waiting! Cloud's in trouble!
Please come. Help us!
Over there!

blockquote.p:
Barret
Yea... yeah!
I don't know what's goin' on, but let's just get on with it.

Nanaki
R, right!
I'm not sure I understand... but I'll go if you want me to.

scene.p: Barret or Nanaki nods to Tifa and runs off in the indicated direction.

Tifa
......hee hee hee... And remember...
Tifa's image morphs into Sephiroth.

Sephiroth
...the Black Materia!
He disappears, and the others are visible again, lying unconscious.
Back to the Shinra...

Scarlet
Mr. President... I've got a bad feeling about this place...

Rufus
Hmm... maybe we should go back to our ship now.
We need to prepare for the inspection anyway.
A flash, and Cloud his party appear among them.

Scarlet
Hey!!! Where did you come from?

Cloud
...don't know...
This place is going to get rough.
Better leave things to me and get out of here while you still can!!

Rufus
Leave things to you? Hmph... I don't know what you mean.

Cloud
This is where the Reunion is happening. Where everything begins and ends.

Tifa
Cloud!!

blockquote.p:
Barret
Hey! We're here to help you!

Nanaki
I'm here! I'm here to help you, Cloud!

scene.p: Cloud clutches his head and slowly walks towards Barret or Nanaki.

Cloud
Thanks... Barret. Where's the Black Materia?
Or:
Thanks... Nanaki. Where's the Black Materia?

Tifa
Cloud!!

blockquote.p:
Barret
It's safe. I have it.

Nanaki
It's safe. I'm holding on to it.

scene.p:
Cloud
I'll take it from here. Give me the... Black Materia.

Tifa
You can't hear my voice?

blockquote.p:
Barret
You alright?

Nanaki
Are you all right, Cloud?

scene.p: Cloud nods.

blockquote.p:
Barret
Okay then, here. Had a lot of pressure holding this thing.

Nanaki
Then... here you go. I was a little apprehensive holding this thing.

scene.p:
Tifa
No, don't!! Please stop, Cloud!

Cloud
Thanks. ......leave the rest to me
The screen goes white momentarily.
Come on. The Black materia...
Wait! Just a little longer!

Cloud
Everyone, thanks for everything. And... I'm sorry.
...Sorry.
...Sorry.
Especially you, Tifa. I'm really sorry.
You've been so good to me...... I don't know what to say...
I never lived up to being 'Cloud'.
Tifa...... Maybe one day you'll meet the real 'Cloud'.
Tifa shakes her head and falls to her knees.

Hojo
Ha, ha, ha... this is perfect!!!
It means that my experiment was a complete success.
What number were you? Huh? Where is your tattoo?

Cloud
Professor Hojo... I don't have a number.
You didn't give me one because you said I was a failed experiment.

Hojo
What the--? You mean only a failure made it here?

Cloud
Professor... please give me a number. Please, Professor...

Hojo
Shut up, miserable failure...
Cloud flies up into a tangle of branches above them.

Rufus
Who... was that?

Hojo
...He's a Sephiroth-clone I created after the real Sephiroth died five years ago.
Jenova cells and Mako, with my knowledge and skills, have been combined with science and nature to bring him to life.
...I'm not wild about the failure part, but the Jenova Reunion Theory has now been proven.
You see, even if Jenova's body is dismembered, it will eventually become one again. That's what is meant by Jenova's Reunion.
I have been waiting for the Reunion to start. Five years have passed, and now the Clones have begun to return.
I thought the clones would begin to gather at Midgar where Jenova is stored.
But my predictions were not entirely correct. Jenova itself began to move away from the Shinra Building.
But being a genius that I am, I soon figured it out. You see it was all Sephiroth's doing.
Sephiroth is not just content to diffuse his will into the Lifestream; he wants to manipulate the Clones himself.
Yes, that was how it got started.

Hojo
I wondered where the clones were going, but I was never able to figure it out.
I couldn't figure it out, either.
Below, the third party member runs over to Tifa and helps her up.

Hojo
The one thing that I did know was that Sephiroth was at their final destination.

I wasn't pursuing Sephiroth.
I was being summoned by Sephiroth.
All the anger and hatred I bore him, made it impossible for me to ever forget him. That and what he gave me.
Cloud stands.

Sephiroth? Sephiroth? I'm here. And I brought you the Black materia.
Show yourself to me. Where are you?
Sephiroth... So we finally meet again.
At the center of the tangle of branches, Sephiroth's body is encased in a huge crystal, his eyes closed.

Hojo
Did you see it!! It's Sephiroth! So he IS here!
This is perfect! Both Jenova's Reunion and Sephiroth's will!
They won't be diffused into the Lifestream,
but gathered here! Mwa, haa, ha,......

Tifa
What are you so happy about, Professor? You know what this means, don't you?
Cloud has the Black Materia!
Sephiroth is going to summon Meteor! Every single person is going to die!

Rufus
Whatever I say now is too little... too late...... We must evacuate.
I want you all to come with me. There is still much more I want to hear.

blockquote.p:
Barret
Yo! Cloud! Stop! Knock it off!

Nanaki
Cloud, NO! Stop! Please!

scene.p:
Tifa
Cloud------!!

Cloud gives the Black Materia to Sephiroth. Below, the others run for the Highwind, leaving him behind, and the airship pulls away from the Northern Crater as the Planet's Weapons explode from hiding.
